psqi_01.Description: During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?

psqi_02.Description: During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?

psqi_03.Description: During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?

psqi_04.Description: During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night?

psqi_05a.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05b.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Wake up in the middle of the night or early morning?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05c.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Have to get up to use the bathroom?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05d.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Cannot breathe comfortably?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05e.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Cough or snore loudly?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05f.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Feel too cold?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05g.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Feel too hot?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05h.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Have bad dreams?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05i.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Have pain?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_05j.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you: Other reason(s)

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_06.Description: During the past month, how often have you taken medicine to help you sleep (prescribed or ?over the counter?)?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_07.Description: During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activity?

Levels.3: Three or more times a week

psqi_08.Description: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?

psqi_09.Description: During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?

psqi_sleep_efficiency.Description: Sleep Efficiency = Time in bed/Time asleep

psqi_component_04.Description: Component 4: Sleep efficiency = psqi_01 + psqi_03 + psqi_04

psqi_component_06.LongName: PSQI Component 6: Use of sleep medication
psqi_component_06.Description: Component 6: Use of sleep medication = psqi_06

psqi_score_global.Description: Global PSQI Score: Sum of components 1-7
